00031 void start_daemon();
00032 void stop_daemon();

00038 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00039 {
00040         start_daemon();
00041         install_sigaction();
00042 
00043         /*
00044          * Daemon runs...
00045          */
00046         // TODO: Test the implementation and delete the sleep statement.
00047         dbus_listen();
00048         //sleep(10);
00049 
00050         stop_daemon();
00051 }
00052 
00053 void start_daemon()
00054 {
00055 
00056         if ( 0 == access(LOCKFILE, 0) ) {
00057                 fprintf(stderr, "Daemon couldn't be started.\nIs another instance started? When not please delete the file: %s\n", LOCKFILE);
00058                 exit(1);
00059         }
00060 
00061         pid_t d_pid = fork();
00062 
00063         if ( 0 > d_pid ) {
00064                 fprintf(stderr, "Error in start_daemon(): %s\n", errno);
00065                 exit(1);
00066         }
00067 
00068         if ( 0 < d_pid ) {
00069                 printf("Daemon started succesfully!\n");
00070                 write_logentry("Daemon started successfully", "moksec daemon", INFO_FLAG);
00071                 exit(0);
00072         } else {
00073                 FILE *lockfile = fopen(LOCKFILE, "w");
00074                 fprintf(lockfile, "%d\n", getpid());
00075                 fclose(lockfile);
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void stop_daemon()
00080 {
00081         printf("Daemon will be closed...\n");
00082         write_logentry("Daemon exit successfully", "moksec daemon", INFO_FLAG);
00083         remove(LOCKFILE);
00084         exit(0);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void dbus_listen()
00088 {
00089         DBusMessage *msg;
00090         DBusMessage *reply;
00091         DBusMessageIter args;
00092         DBusConnection *conn;
00093         DBusError error;
00094         int ret;
00095         char *param;
00096         char *logentry;
00097 
00098         dbus_error_init(&error);
00099 
00100         conn = dbus_bus_get(DBUS_BUS_SESSION, &error);
00101         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00102                 sprintf(logentry, "Connection Error (%s)", error.message);
00103                 write_logentry(logentry, "moksec daemon", ERR_FLAG);
00104                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00105         }
00106         if ( NULL == conn ) {
00107                 sprintf(logentry, "Connection Null");
00108                 write_logentry(logentry, "moksec daemon", ERR_FLAG);
00109                 exit(1);
00110         }
00111 
00112         ret = dbus_bus_request_name(conn, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.server", DBUS_NAME_FLAG_REPLACE_EXISTING, &error);
00113         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00114                 sprintf(logentry, "Name Error (%s)\n", error.message);
00115                 write_logentry(logentry, "moksec daemon", ERR_FLAG);
00116                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00117         }
00118         if ( DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_PRIMARY_OWNER != ret ) {
00119                 sprintf(logentry, "Not Primary Owner (%d)\n", ret);
00120                 write_logentry(logentry, "moksec daemon", ERR_FLAG);
00121                 exit(1);
00122         }
00123 
00124         while (true) {
00125                 dbus_connection_read_write(conn, 0);
00126                 msg = dbus_connection_pop_message(conn);
00127 
00128                 if ( NULL == msg ) {
00129                         sleep(1);
00130                         continue;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkwhitelist") )
00134                         write_logentry("checkwhitelist called...", "moksec daemon", INFO_FLAG);
00135                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkblacklist") )
00136                         write_logentry("checkblacklist called...", "moksec daemon", INFO_FLAG);
00137 
00138                 dbus_message_unref(msg);
00139         }
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00143 void install_sigaction()
00144 {
00145         struct sigaction sa;
00146         sa.sa_handler = react_to_signal;
00147         sigemptyset(&sa.sa_mask);
00148         sigaddset(&sa.sa_mask, SIGTERM);
00149         sigaddset(&sa.sa_mask, SIGUSR1);
00150         sigaddset(&sa.sa_mask, SIGUSR2);
00151         sa.sa_flags = 0;
00152         sigaction(SIGTERM, &sa, NULL);
00153         sigaction(SIGUSR1, &sa, NULL);
00154         sigaction(SIGUSR2, &sa, NULL);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void react_to_signal(int sig)
00158 {
00159         if ( SIGTERM == sig ) {
00160                 stop_daemon();
00161         }
00162         if ( SIGUSR1 == sig ) {
00163         }
00164         if ( SIGUSR2 == sig ) {
00165         }
00166 }
